publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-821 Mr Andy Kerr: Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2004-That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2004 (SSI 2004/14) be approved.
S2M-821 Mr Andy Kerr: Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2004-That the Parliament agrees that the Local Government Finance (Scotland) Order 2004 (SSI 2004/14) be approved.
